item.title: AIA-38: Support for Attachments
item.description:
Reporter Rob Williams (rob)
Created Sep 4, 2014 9:03:42 PM
Updated Sep 5, 2014 12:44:52 PM
Resolved Sep 4, 2014 9:05:08 PM
Priority Normal
Type Task
State Fixed
Assignee Rob Williams (rob)
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 0.0.3
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
Currently, attachments do not appear in changes. So we have to have some logic that just looks for attachments that were added in the time window of interest and simply add them as an edit.
